If it burns, it will never be available again."},{"lineNumber":254758,"originalJapaneseLine":"手に入らない、いいのかなぁ、燃やしてしまっても・・","translatedEnglishLine":"You can't get it anywhere else. Howzer's HP below 40%"},{"lineNumber":254762,"originalJapaneseLine":"炎、飛行を封じられだいぶピンチ","translatedEnglishLine":"With flames and flying sealed off, he's in quite a pinch."},{"lineNumber":254763,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":254764,"originalJapaneseLine":"ぐっ・・・このままでは、そうだ逃げよう","translatedEnglishLine":"Ugh... at this rate, that's right, I should run away."},{"lineNumber":254765,"originalJapaneseLine":"とハウゼルが洞窟の出口に向かおうとすると","translatedEnglishLine":"As Howzer attempts to head toward the cave exit,"},{"lineNumber":254766,"originalJapaneseLine":"サクラ「あっ、ドラゴンパッチ７巻の残りわずかみたいだわ","translatedEnglishLine":"Sakura: \"Ah, it looks like there are only a few copies left of Dragon Patch Volume 7.\""},{"lineNumber":254767,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　　こんな戦いが始まって逃げ出したいけど、今並んでおかないと","translatedEnglishLine":"I've got this fight starting and want to run away, but if I don't line up now,"},{"lineNumber":254768,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　　２度と手に入らないわ」棒読み、　ネタ＝文字通りサクラ","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll never get it again.\" Monotone delivery, joke = literally Sakura."},{"lineNumber":254769,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハウゼルは本が気になって逃げれない。","translatedEnglishLine":"Howzer can't run away because he's concerned about the book."},{"lineNumber":254770,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんとか倒して捕まえる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Somehow, defeat him and capture him."},{"lineNumber":254771,"originalJapaneseLine":"卑怯ですと文句を言うハウゼルだが、カオスを突きつけられてそれまで","translatedEnglishLine":"Howzer complains it's unfair, but when Chaos is threatened, he stops."},{"lineNumber":254772,"originalJapaneseLine":"負けました・・せめて、死ぬ前にあの本を見せて下さい。","translatedEnglishLine":"I've lost... At least, please let me see that book before I die."},{"lineNumber":254773,"originalJapaneseLine":"それを見て・・あわあわと困るドエススキー、そこまでわしの本を・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Seeing that... Doessky flustered and troubled, 'My book... to that extent...'"},{"lineNumber":254774,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかし、わしはなんて事をと・・作家苦悩とか","translatedEnglishLine":"But what have I done... writer's anguish and such."},{"lineNumber":254775,"originalJapaneseLine":"そんなのは無視してランスの決断","translatedEnglishLine":"Ignoring all that, Rance's decision."},{"lineNumber":254776,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞選択","translatedEnglishLine":"> Choice"},{"lineNumber":254777,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞本を見せる","translatedEnglishLine":"> Show the book"},{"lineNumber":254778,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞本を見せない","translatedEnglishLine":"> Don't show the book"},{"lineNumber":254779,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞本を見せる","translatedEnglishLine":"> Show the book"},{"lineNumber":254780,"originalJapaneseLine":"しばらく読むとハウゼルが怒る、なんだ・・これは・・","translatedEnglishLine":"After reading for a while, Howzer gets angry, 'What... is this...?'"},{"lineNumber":254781,"originalJapaneseLine":"時間が無いドエススキーに適当にかかせたので無茶苦茶。","translatedEnglishLine":"It was written messily because Doessky made it hastily without time."},{"lineNumber":254782,"originalJapaneseLine":"もしくは白紙","translatedEnglishLine":"Or it might be blank."},{"lineNumber":254783,"originalJapaneseLine":"怒ったハウゼルにランス達は焼き殺されます","translatedEnglishLine":"If Howzer gets angry, Rance and the others will be burned to death."},{"lineNumber":254784,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞本を見せない","translatedEnglishLine":"> Don't show the book"},{"lineNumber":254785,"originalJapaneseLine":"残念だな、お前もみただろう、２００名以上が並んでいた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Too bad, you saw it too, right? Over 200 people were lined up."},{"lineNumber":254786,"originalJapaneseLine":"とっくに売れてしまったわ。","translatedEnglishLine":"It's already sold out long ago."},{"lineNumber":254787,"originalJapaneseLine":"くっ・・・朝一で並んだのに・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Ugh... even though I lined up first thing in the morning..."},{"lineNumber":254788,"originalJapaneseLine":"ま、任せろ、俺がどこかから奪い取ってきてやる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, leave it to me, I'll snatch one from somewhere."},{"lineNumber":254789,"originalJapaneseLine":"ほ、ほんとうなのか・・と　懐く","translatedEnglishLine":"Reassured: \"R-Really...?\" and warms up."},{"lineNumber":254790,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺の城に来い","translatedEnglishLine":"Come to my castle."},{"lineNumber":254791,"originalJapaneseLine":"わかった","translatedEnglishLine":"Got it."},{"lineNumber":254792,"originalJapaneseLine":"その頃、北部の戦場、魔軍司令部","translatedEnglishLine":"At that time, northern battlefield, demon army headquarters."},{"lineNumber":254793,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物将軍、なんだと・・ハウゼルが人間共に捕まっただと・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Demon general: What... Howzer was captured by the humans...?"},{"lineNumber":254794,"originalJapaneseLine":"火炎書士の報告聞く","translatedEnglishLine":"Listens to the report from the flame scribe."},{"lineNumber":254795,"originalJapaneseLine":"それを窓の外から来ているサイゼル","translatedEnglishLine":"Saizel, coming from outside the window."},{"lineNumber":254796,"originalJapaneseLine":"えっ、ハウゼルが捕まった・・て、あのカオスを持つ男にて事・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Eh, Howzer was captured... by that man who wields Chaos...?"},{"lineNumber":254797,"originalJapaneseLine":"ガクガク、ぶるぶる・・・ハウゼルが無事なはずが無い・・・あの男に","translatedEnglishLine":"Shaking uncontrollably... There's no way Howzer is safe... with that man."},{"lineNumber":254798,"originalJapaneseLine":"ひどい事をされている、た、助けないと・・でも、怖い","translatedEnglishLine":"He's being treated terribly, I-I've got to help him... but I'm scared."},{"lineNumber":254799,"originalJapaneseLine":"どうしよう、魔物大将軍ヨシフ様に怒られる","translatedEnglishLine":"What should I do? Demon General Yoshif will get angry."},{"lineNumber":254800,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物将軍はヨシフをとことん恐れている、そしてわれ先にと逃げ出す","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon general fears Yoshif thoroughly, and they hurry to escape."},{"lineNumber":254801,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":254802,"originalJapaneseLine":"３軍、４軍の司令部","translatedEnglishLine":"Headquarters of the 3rd and 4th armies."},{"lineNumber":254803,"originalJapaneseLine":"おかしいな、魔軍が止まったぞ、なんか動揺しているようだ","translatedEnglishLine":"That's strange, the demon army has stopped. They seem shaken."},{"lineNumber":254804,"originalJapaneseLine":"よし、いっきにいくぞーと","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, let's go all at once!"},{"lineNumber":254805,"originalJapaneseLine":"リーザス軍がいっきに盛り返すシーン","translatedEnglishLine":"Scene where the Lizas army quickly recovers."},{"lineNumber":254806,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス城","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance Castle."},{"lineNumber":254807,"originalJapaneseLine":"サチコに図書室を案内されてご満悦なハウゼル","translatedEnglishLine":"Howzer is delighted as Sachiko guides him through the library."},{"lineNumber":254808,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこに、火炎司書が現れる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Then, the Flame Scribe appears."},{"lineNumber":254809,"originalJapaneseLine":"カオスに殺されているかと思ったけど無事だったのね","translatedEnglishLine":"I thought you’d been killed by Chaos, but you’re safe."},{"lineNumber":254810,"originalJapaneseLine":"さぁ、戻りましょう、","translatedEnglishLine":"Come on, let’s go back."},{"lineNumber":254811,"originalJapaneseLine":"ケイブリス様の命令に従わないとホーネット様が殺されてしまいますよ","translatedEnglishLine":"If we don't obey Lord Kaibris's orders, Lord Hornet will be killed."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 残念だったな、ここは鍾乳洞の中だぞ、自由には飛べまい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Too bad, this is inside a limestone cave, you can't fly freely here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: むむ・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （こうして前回の戦闘で苦戦したハウゼルの飛行が封じられる）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Thus, Howzer's flying, which had struggled in the previous battle, is sealed off.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘中の割り込みイベント　第２ターン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Interrupt event during battle - Turn 2

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウゼルが得意の火炎攻撃をしようとした時
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Howzer tried to use his specialty, the flame attack,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おーーっと、ここにあるのは貴重な本だぞ、燃えてしまったらもう二度と
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh—wait, this is a valuable book here. If it burns, it will never be available again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手に入らない、いいのかなぁ、燃やしてしまっても・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You can't get it anywhere else. Is it really okay to burn it...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぐぬぬぬ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Grrrr...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （こうして前回の戦闘で苦戦したハウゼルの火炎攻撃が封じられる）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Thus, Howzer's flame attack, which had struggled in the previous battle, is sealed off.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘中の割り込みイベント　ハウゼル体力４０％以下
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Interrupt event during battle - Howzer's HP below 40%

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 炎、飛行を封じられだいぶピンチ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With flames and flying sealed off, he's in quite a pinch.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぐっ・・・このままでは、そうだ逃げよう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh... at this rate, that's right, I should run away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とハウゼルが洞窟の出口に向かおうとすると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As Howzer attempts to head toward the cave exit,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サクラ「あっ、ドラゴンパッチ７巻の残りわずかみたいだわ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sakura: "Ah, it looks like there are only a few copies left of Dragon Patch Volume 7."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな戦いが始まって逃げ出したいけど、今並んでおかないと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've got this fight starting and want to run away, but if I don't line up now,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ２度と手に入らないわ」棒読み、　ネタ＝文字通りサクラ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll never get it again." Monotone delivery, joke = literally Sakura.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウゼルは本が気になって逃げれない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Howzer can't run away because he's concerned about the book.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとか倒して捕まえる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Somehow, defeat him and capture him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 卑怯ですと文句を言うハウゼルだが、カオスを突きつけられてそれまで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Howzer complains it's unfair, but when Chaos is threatened, he stops.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 負けました・・せめて、死ぬ前にあの本を見せて下さい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've lost... At least, please let me see that book before I die.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを見て・・あわあわと困るドエススキー、そこまでわしの本を・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seeing that... Doessky flustered and troubled, 'My book... to that extent...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、わしはなんて事をと・・作家苦悩とか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But what have I done... writer's anguish and such.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんなのは無視してランスの決断
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ignoring all that, Rance's decision.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞選択
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Choice

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞本を見せる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Show the book

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞本を見せない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Don't show the book

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞本を見せる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Show the book

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しばらく読むとハウゼルが怒る、なんだ・・これは・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After reading for a while, Howzer gets angry, 'What... is this...?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 時間が無いドエススキーに適当にかかせたので無茶苦茶。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was written messily because Doessky made it hastily without time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もしくは白紙
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Or it might be blank.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 怒ったハウゼルにランス達は焼き殺されます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If Howzer gets angry, Rance and the others will be burned to death.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞本を見せない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Don't show the book

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 残念だな、お前もみただろう、２００名以上が並んでいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Too bad, you saw it too, right? Over 200 people were lined up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とっくに売れてしまったわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's already sold out long ago.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: くっ・・・朝一で並んだのに・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh... even though I lined up first thing in the morning...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、任せろ、俺がどこかから奪い取ってきてやる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, leave it to me, I'll snatch one from somewhere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほ、ほんとうなのか・・と　懐く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reassured: "R-Really...?" and warms up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺の城に来い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Come to my castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Got it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、北部の戦場、魔軍司令部
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time, northern battlefield, demon army headquarters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍、なんだと・・ハウゼルが人間共に捕まっただと・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon general: What... Howzer was captured by the humans...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 火炎書士の報告聞く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Listens to the report from the flame scribe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを窓の外から来ているサイゼル
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Saizel, coming from outside the window.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えっ、ハウゼルが捕まった・・て、あのカオスを持つ男にて事・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eh, Howzer was captured... by that man who wields Chaos...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガクガク、ぶるぶる・・・ハウゼルが無事なはずが無い・・・あの男に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shaking uncontrollably... There's no way Howzer is safe... with that man.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひどい事をされている、た、助けないと・・でも、怖い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He's being treated terribly, I-I've got to help him... but I'm scared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうしよう、魔物大将軍ヨシフ様に怒られる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What should I do? Demon General Yoshif will get angry.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍はヨシフをとことん恐れている、そしてわれ先にと逃げ出す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon general fears Yoshif thoroughly, and they hurry to escape.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ３軍、４軍の司令部
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Headquarters of the 3rd and 4th armies.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おかしいな、魔軍が止まったぞ、なんか動揺しているようだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's strange, the demon army has stopped. They seem shaken.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、いっきにいくぞーと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, let's go all at once!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス軍がいっきに盛り返すシーン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Scene where the Lizas army quickly recovers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サチコに図書室を案内されてご満悦なハウゼル
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Howzer is delighted as Sachiko guides him through the library.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこに、火炎司書が現れる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, the Flame Scribe appears.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオスに殺されているかと思ったけど無事だったのね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I thought you’d been killed by Chaos, but you’re safe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さぁ、戻りましょう、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Come on, let’s go back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリス様の命令に従わないとホーネット様が殺されてしまいますよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If we don't obey Lord Kaibris's orders, Lord Hornet will be killed.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

Demon General Yoshif will get angry."},{"lineNumber":254800,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物将軍はヨシフをとことん恐れている、そしてわれ先にと逃げ出す","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon general fears Yoshif thoroughly, and they hurry to escape."},{"lineNumber":254801,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":254802,"originalJapaneseLine":"３軍、４軍の司令部","translatedEnglishLine":"Headquarters of the 3rd and 4th armies."},{"lineNumber":254803,"originalJapaneseLine":"おかしいな、魔軍が止まったぞ、なんか動揺しているようだ","translatedEnglishLine":"That's strange, the demon army has stopped. translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 残念だったな、ここは鍾乳洞の中だぞ、自由には飛べまい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Too bad, this is inside a limestone cave, you can't fly freely here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: むむ・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （こうして前回の戦闘で苦戦したハウゼルの飛行が封じられる）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Thus, Howzer's flying, which had struggled in the previous battle, is sealed off.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘中の割り込みイベント　第２ターン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Interrupt event during battle - Turn 2

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウゼルが得意の火炎攻撃をしようとした時
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Howzer tried to use his specialty, the flame attack,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おーーっと、ここにあるのは貴重な本だぞ、燃えてしまったらもう二度と
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh—wait, this is a valuable book here. If it burns, it will never be available again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手に入らない、いいのかなぁ、燃やしてしまっても・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You can't get it anywhere else. Is it really okay to burn it...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぐぬぬぬ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Grrrr...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （こうして前回の戦闘で苦戦したハウゼルの火炎攻撃が封じられる）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Thus, Howzer's flame attack, which had struggled in the previous battle, is sealed off.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘中の割り込みイベント　ハウゼル体力４０％以下
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Interrupt event during battle - Howzer's HP below 40%

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 炎、飛行を封じられだいぶピンチ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With flames and flying sealed off, he's in quite a pinch.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぐっ・・・このままでは、そうだ逃げよう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh... at this rate, that's right, I should run away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とハウゼルが洞窟の出口に向かおうとすると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As Howzer attempts to head toward the cave exit,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サクラ「あっ、ドラゴンパッチ７巻の残りわずかみたいだわ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sakura: "Ah, it looks like there are only a few copies left of Dragon Patch Volume 7."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな戦いが始まって逃げ出したいけど、今並んでおかないと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've got this fight starting and want to run away, but if I don't line up now,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ２度と手に入らないわ」棒読み、　ネタ＝文字通りサクラ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll never get it again." Monotone delivery, joke = literally Sakura.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウゼルは本が気になって逃げれない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Howzer can't run away because he's concerned about the book.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとか倒して捕まえる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Somehow, defeat him and capture him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 卑怯ですと文句を言うハウゼルだが、カオスを突きつけられてそれまで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Howzer complains it's unfair, but when Chaos is threatened, he stops.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 負けました・・せめて、死ぬ前にあの本を見せて下さい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've lost... At least, please let me see that book before I die.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを見て・・あわあわと困るドエススキー、そこまでわしの本を・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seeing that... Doessky flustered and troubled, 'My book... to that extent...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、わしはなんて事をと・・作家苦悩とか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But what have I done... writer's anguish and such.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんなのは無視してランスの決断
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ignoring all that, Rance's decision.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞選択
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Choice

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞本を見せる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Show the book

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞本を見せない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Don't show the book

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞本を見せる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Show the book

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しばらく読むとハウゼルが怒る、なんだ・・これは・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After reading for a while, Howzer gets angry, 'What... is this...?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 時間が無いドエススキーに適当にかかせたので無茶苦茶。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was written messily because Doessky made it hastily without time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もしくは白紙
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Or it might be blank.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 怒ったハウゼルにランス達は焼き殺されます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If Howzer gets angry, Rance and the others will be burned to death.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞本を見せない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Don't show the book

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 残念だな、お前もみただろう、２００名以上が並んでいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Too bad, you saw it too, right? Over 200 people were lined up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とっくに売れてしまったわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's already sold out long ago.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: くっ・・・朝一で並んだのに・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh... even though I lined up first thing in the morning...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、任せろ、俺がどこかから奪い取ってきてやる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, leave it to me, I'll snatch one from somewhere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほ、ほんとうなのか・・と　懐く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reassured: "R-Really...?" and warms up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺の城に来い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Come to my castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Got it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、北部の戦場、魔軍司令部
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time, northern battlefield, demon army headquarters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍、なんだと・・ハウゼルが人間共に捕まっただと・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon general: What... Howzer was captured by the humans...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 火炎書士の報告聞く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Listens to the report from the flame scribe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを窓の外から来ているサイゼル
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Saizel, coming from outside the window.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えっ、ハウゼルが捕まった・・て、あのカオスを持つ男にて事・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eh, Howzer was captured... by that man who wields Chaos...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガクガク、ぶるぶる・・・ハウゼルが無事なはずが無い・・・あの男に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shaking uncontrollably... There's no way Howzer is safe... with that man.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひどい事をされている、た、助けないと・・でも、怖い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He's being treated terribly, I-I've got to help him... but I'm scared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうしよう、魔物大将軍ヨシフ様に怒られる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What should I do? Demon General Yoshif will get angry.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍はヨシフをとことん恐れている、そしてわれ先にと逃げ出す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon general fears Yoshif thoroughly, and they hurry to escape.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ３軍、４軍の司令部
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Headquarters of the 3rd and 4th armies.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おかしいな、魔軍が止まったぞ、なんか動揺しているようだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's strange, the demon army has stopped. They seem shaken.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、いっきにいくぞーと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, let's go all at once!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス軍がいっきに盛り返すシーン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Scene where the Lizas army quickly recovers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サチコに図書室を案内されてご満悦なハウゼル
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Howzer is delighted as Sachiko guides him through the library.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこに、火炎司書が現れる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, the Flame Scribe appears.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオスに殺されているかと思ったけど無事だったのね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I thought you’d been killed by Chaos, but you’re safe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さぁ、戻りましょう、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Come on, let’s go back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリス様の命令に従わないとホーネット様が殺されてしまいますよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If we don't obey Lord Kaibris's orders, Lord Hornet will be killed.
